recipe.title: Grapefruit Cooler
ingredients: 9 cups (2 1/4 quarts) fresh red grapefruit juice (from about 6 grapefruits)
instructions: In a pitcher half-filled with ice cubes, stir together juice and seltzer or soda and garnish with mint.
In a pitcher half-filled with ice cubes, stir together juice and seltzer or soda and garnish with mint.
